title: Future Learning Design: Collaborative and Speculative Design-Based Language Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate language proficiency and basic usage of digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning design reflecting future scenarios for diverse learners in a limited technological environment centered around smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively design a language learning roadmap while imagining various future scenarios
Learners can produce content simulating the 2030 language usage environment using speculative design techniques
Learners can develop three or more microlearning modules addressing future learning needs based on peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
